data.title: Why didn't the ancient Greeks use cavalry?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 3): Short answer: They did, but were expensive and few.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hippeis
https://www.colorado.edu/classics/2018/06/19/horses-ancient-greek-life
So cavalry existed, but often only in small numbers such as a few dozen or few hundred compared to the thousands of in...
